document_data.caption: A map showing the Merchant District of Skuld outlined in red.
document_data.name: Merchant District of Skuld
document_data.mainbody: The '''Merchant District''' was a walled section of the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Merchant District was located in the southwest part of Skuld. The district's southern border ran along the north bank of the [[River of Shadows]], and the western border abutted the [[Alamber Sea]].
document_data.Description: Walls surrounded the Merchant District. A gate was located on the north wall that connected to the northwest section of the city, and another gate was located on the east wall that connected to the [[Skuld/Warehouse District|Warehouse District]]. The [[Bridge Gate (Skuld)|Bridge Gate]] to the south spanned the River of Shadows and connected to the naval yard.
